307.sentence: imagine my shock - and absolute instant disdain for any products made by apex .

308.sentence: the 2nd dvd player had a faulty power supply which caused to occasionally not turn on .

309.sentence: the ad-1600 did n't work corectly from the start and the ad-1220 lasted about a week and a half before it started to act up .

312.sentence: for the price , it 's a very nice dvd player .

313.sentence: the front door is miss aligned on my unit and you have to manually life it up just so slightly for the door to close , a very annoying thing after ahwile .

314.sentence: it does play a wide range of formats as advertised which is very nice .

315.sentence: and so far have not had any problems with dvds not being able to play .

316.sentence: i only wanted something to play dvds on but this machine has all these other features that i probably will never use but it 's nice to know that there 're there .

317.sentence: the machine is very light and slim and fits nicely into my tv stand .

318.sentence: the machine is very light and slim and fits nicely into my tv stand .

319.sentence: i 've had no problems at all so far and i 'm very happy .

320.sentence: we tried the " finding nemo " dvd and when we got to ~ chapter 28 , the frames started to freeze for no reason .

321.sentence: i can 't rate it one star only because when it does work it 's pretty good .

322.sentence: only owned it about two weeks so i expect we 're looking at getting another progressive scan dvd player of higher quality very soon .

323.sentence: the player kept displaying " no disc " , so i tried the disc in another machine and sure as @ # * !

338.sentence: of course , i was hesitant given the price , but i 've been extremely impressed since receiving it , and bought a second one as a christmas present for my parents .

339.sentence: the picture is perfect , although i 'm not watching on an hdtv .

340.sentence: it seems to be a little slow when identifying a new disc that 's inserted - maybe 10 seconds of wait .

341.sentence: but , dollar for dollar , this dvd player is probably the best out there .

342.sentence: when i hooked it up it only produced sound - a cd played fine , but with a dvd i only got the audio - no picture !
